name: Neal Harris
body: ### `whoami` I lead the Security Infrastructure Team at [Square](https://squareup.com). We write a lot of really cool software that keeps our customers' businesses safe. If you like security, and you like writing software, you should get in touch with me! In a former life, I studied number theory and representation theory in the [Math Department at UCSD](https://math.ucsd.edu). [Here's](http://arxiv.org/pdf/1201.0518v2.pdf) a math paper I wrote long ago. ### Coordinates Email: - [Personal](mailto:neal.harris@gmail.com) - [Square](mailto:neal@squareup.com) [Keybase](https://keybase.io/nealh) Follow @iamtheneal
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
